'''''"Bronzelock"''''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Duelist: Series II]]''. 

The achievements are earned by defeating the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Ruin Drake: Earthguard|text=Bronzelock &mdash; Capricious Warbeast}} while completing challenge conditions.
